name:
Parascientific Escape
 - Gear Detective
description:
Parascientific Escape～Gear Detective～ is a sequel to Parascientific Escape～Cruise in the distant seas～, where the player is required to find clues and solve puzzles to escape certain situation using PSI abilities.
The story follows Detective Kyosuke Ayana, who has the ability named chronokinesis which allows him to look back in time in a limited field of view, for up till 5 days back. Detective Ayana is hired to find a serial killer threatening the quiet neighborhood of Camellia Hills - but soon finds himself in much bigger trouble as he investigates the crime scenes.
disclaimer:
You may need to upgrade your current SD Card to a compatible SDHC Card or microSDHC Card with enough available space to download this software.
Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.
